attributes.action: Keep speeding fines in proportion to the offence.
attributes.background: On April 24th 2017 the level of punishment if you are caught speeding is increasing.This will include far harsher fines,with 3 bands of fines being introduced the minimum of which is 50% of weekly salary.Disqualification is a far more realistic possibility now also.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
